details: I am currently pursuing Master of Science in Computer Science at Northeastern University, Boston, Massachusetts. I am a Graduate Teaching Assistant for Algorithms. I completed my Bachelors in Information and Communication Technology with minor in Computational Science from DAIICT, Gandhinagar, India.

I worked for 2 years as a Software Engineer at Samsung Research Institute, Noida, India. Before that I also worked as an intern there for 5 months. For my contributions to the Email application, I received Employee of the Quarter Award (July - September, 2020). I was also one of the few employees who passed Samsung Software Proficiency Exam - Professional Level.
